fulltext:
Tran Trung Nguyen
BrSE-Trainer
Date of birth:
 September 26, 1984
Gender:  Male
Phone:  0914304543
Email:  trantrnguyen15@gmail.com
Address:
 69 Lo Duc, Hai Ba Trung, Ha Noi
CAREER OBJECTIVE
A hard-working, highly motivated person seeking employment with a company that can give me an opportunity
to become a BrSE.
WORK EXPERIENCE
April 2017 - Mar 2019
Senior Tester, Business Analyst (German) at Kloon
Project name: Stratsigner 
Project overview: Marketing,CRM (customer relationship
management), customer surveys 
Application Type: website, mobile application. 
Technologies: asp.net, SQL server 
Project size: 9 members 
Position:  Senior Tester, Business Analyst 
Main responsibilities:
- Liaised between clients and internal development team
- Analysed, documented new requirements 
- Coached and trained team members on new tasks and software
functions
- Assigned responsibilities and tracked the progress of team member's
tasks
- Estimated test, reviewed test case, test result from team members
- Wrote test case, executed test
- Delivered software output to clients, supported clients in product
troubleshooting during acceptance test phase
Achievement year 2018: 
- I advanced in the team from being a Junior Tester member without
prior practical experience to being a Senior Tester who leads a team of
4 members.
- The most progressive, excellence employee of Stratsigner Project
- English certificate Bulats C2
Aug 2015 -  Jan 2017
Technical Support,  Receptionist at Flamingo Travel
SKILLS
Language
English: Self-taught
- Bulats: C2 (Standard), B2 High (Writing)
German: 
- Full professional proficiency
Japanese: Self-taught 
- Probably N3 
French: Self-taught
- Probably A2
Computer Languages:
- Basic knowledge with Ruby (Ruby on Rails) , C#, Python
Development Tools:
- Sublime Text 
- Visual Studio
Databases: 
- SQL Server (basic)
Soft Skills/ Attitude
- Have a strong work ethic and I enjoy working under pressure, willing to
take on new challenges.
- Be able to work independently or work in groups. 
- Curious, and eager to learn new things. 
2010 - 2014
University Bonn Rhein- Sieg
2005 - 2010
University RWTH Aachen
2002 - 2003
University of Technology Bach Khoa
EDUCATION
INTERESTS
- I love learning foreign languages
- Python, Django, ReactJs, Machine Learning, Fintech.
- Reading
